snippet: In the south central portion of the United States, cooking classes build friendship and knowledge of Turkish food.
abstract: Cooking classes on preparing Turkish cuisine have sprung up across the south-central part of the country in the last several years; meeting weekly, groups of women cook a meal, eat, and share stories and recipes for cultural dishes.
lead_paragraph: In the south central portion of the United States, cooking classes build friendship and knowledge of Turkish food.

headline.seo: Cooking Classes Help Spread Flavor of Turkey
headline.main: Building a Turkish Empire, One Friend at a Time
headline.print_headline: Building a Turkish Empire, One Friend at a Time
